scripts.build: pnpm nx run theme:build && pnpm run transpile-react-jsx-components && node static-files-distribute.js
scripts.clean: pnpm clean:lock-files && pnpm clean:maven-folders && pnpm clean:node-modules
scripts.clean:lock-files: pnpm rimraf package-lock.json && pnpm rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm rimraf yarn.lock
